text: M.DIA was a footwear trademark founded in 1999, in suburbs of Paris (France), by Mohamed Dia. The Dia signed a license with NBA and created a textile collection NBA by Dia. Previously the brand was spread by Secteur Ä the rapper crew (Passi, Stomy Bugsy, les Neg’marrons and Ärsenik). In 2005, Mohamed Dia created his own record label called Dia Entertainment. Ärsenik takes part in the project. Category:Shoe brands Category:Products introduced in 1999 Category:Clothing companies of France Category:Shoe companies of France
title: M.Dia
